resources.string:
About Me
 I am an IT student with a passion for programming, game development, and system design. I work on various projects, including mobile applications, game engines, and software development. I enjoy experimenting with different technologies, such as C, Kotlin, Vulkan API, and SDL2. In my free time, I also design D&D campaigns and work on optimizing algorithms.
About the Calculator:
 This calculator app offers both a simple and scientific mode, allowing users to perform basic and advanced calculations. It dynamically adjusts its layout to different screen sizes and orientations for a seamless user experience. The app features real-time state saving, adaptive UI adjustments, and an intuitive design for efficiency and ease of use.
